text: Tyler Bates (born June 5, 1965) is an American musician, producer and composer for film, television and video game scores. == Early life == Bates was born in Los Angeles, California. == Other websites == *Tyler Bates' Website (includes samples of music and many video clips from movies worked on) * Category:1965 births Category:American movie score composers Category:Living people Category:Musicians from Los Angeles Category:Video game composers
title: Tyler Bates
